item.title: Client isn't working (retrying in 60...)
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Kk.

I will try again lol sorry

Complie the client with all of the files first. Once you have completed that, then take all of the notepad files out. Once you have taken all of the notepad files out, do not complie again.

That may work.

Read full topic

item.title: Client isn't working (retrying in 60...)
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“pk george1, post:2, topic:343774”]When you released it did you release it with only the class files(the files that you cannot edit without decompling them) if so then when you complied the client files before you released. Complie the client with all of the files then remove the notepad ones and DONT complie again.

I hope that helped a little[/quote]
That made absolutely no sense…

item.title: Client isn't working (retrying in 60...)
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

When you released it did you release it with only the class files(the files that you cannot edit without decompling them) if so then when you complied the client files before you released. Complie the client with all of the files then remove the notepad ones and DONT complie again.

I hope that helped a little
